abstract.t: The DNS Security Extensions (DNSSEC) define a process for validating received data and assert them authentic and complete as opposed to forged. This document clarifies the scope and responsibilities of DNSSEC Resolver Operators (DRO) as well as operational recommendations that DNSSEC validators operators SHOULD put in place in order to implement sufficient trust that makes DNSSEC validation output accurate. The recommendations described in this document include, provisioning mechanisms as well as monitoring and management mechanisms.
